abstract.p: Thomson Corp reports second-quarter net from databse units rose 33 percent, to $74 million; profits from discontinued division was flat, at $30 million (S)

block.p: A Canadian publisher, the Thomson Corporation, which has almost completed the sale of its newspapers, reported strong sales and profit growth for the second quarter from its continuing businesses -- selling electronic information to professionals. Profit from the database units rose 33 percent to $74 million, or 12 cents a share, on an 18 percent gain in revenue, to $1.46 billion. Profit from the discontinued newspaper division was flat at $30 million, or 5 cents a share.
